kDesc
It's the Modern Dining Room set! Includes the Modern Table, Head Chair, Side Chair, and Modern Buffet/Wine Rack.[#Legal]
Voici un pack moderne pour votre salle à manger ! Comprend une table, une chaise à accoudoirs, une chaise d'appoint et un casier à vin.[#Legal]
Das moderne Esszimmer-Set! Enthält Esstisch, Stuhl mit Armlehnen, Stuhl und Weinregal.[#Legal]
Ecco il pacchetto sala da pranzo moderna! Include tavolo da pranzo, sedia da capotavola, sedia da tavolo e portabottiglie. [#Legal]
¡El conjunto de comedor moderno! Incluye mesa de comedor, silla con brazos, silla auxiliar y botellero.[#Legal]
It's the Modern Dining Room set! Includes the Modern Table, Head Chair, Side Chair, and Modern Buffet/Wine Rack.[#Legal]
현대적인 식당 세트입니다! 탁자, 팔걸이 의자, 보조 의자, 그리고 와인선반을 포함합니다.[#Legal]
It's the Modern Dining Room set! Includes the Modern Table, Head Chair, Side Chair, and Modern Buffet/Wine Rack.[#Legal]
這款現代風飯廳組合包、包括現代風桌子、現代風靠頭椅、現代風直背椅及現代風自助餐架/酒架。[#Legal]
